notes: Very low PFBS at Lake Pleasant Parkway; no PFAS detected in main CAP canal
Low TP in Lake Pleasant profile; supports nutrient-sensitivity and bloom risk modeling
Elevated E. coli in lower Gila corridor; linked to recreation and livestock access
Nutrient-impaired reach; TP near or above criteria
Turbidity exceedances linked to sediment inputs
Salinity managed as part of basin-wide program; ~1.3 Mt/year salt reduction basin-wide
